entities.description: Inability to concentrate or make decisions as reported by the respondent.
Extent to which problems interfere with work or personal life.
Frequency of being unable to carry out daily activities due to mood problems.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has symptoms related to inability to concentrate or make decisions.
Indicates the score of symptom indicators for the respondent.
Describes the level to which problems interfere with the respondent's work or personal life.
Indicates how often the respondent was unable to carry out daily activities due to mood problems.
